rules_text:
When Cenari, the Fifth Desire enters the battlefield, you may return target Insect card from your graveyard to the battlefield if it has mana value 2 or less. Otherwise put it into your hand.
{4}{G}: Transform Cenari, the Fifth Desire. Activate only as a sorcery.
rules_text2:
Reach
Cenari, the Worlds Hand has indestructible as long as you control at least two other Insects.
Whenever another Insect enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses life equal to that creatures power.
notes: When CARDNAME> enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another Insect. If you do, search your library for an Insect card, reveal it and put it into your hand, then shuffle.
